Hi, 
 
This email is to inform you about a piracy report and we request  
immediate action. 
On this ip address 74.52.179.146  that is hosted by you (ThePlanet.com  
Internet Services, Inc) is this site http://asianstreetsex.com 
The design of my client is http://www.free-xxx-galleries.com and the  
site http://asianstreetsex.com. is copied form our client site, from the

code (html, css) to the design. (the only difference is the header) 
And for this meter of fact, we request  immediate action with forcing  
your client to change his design, because he doesn't have any rights to

use that design. If the design of your client will not be changed will  
be force to use legal action on this meter. 
 
"All materials contained in this website www.adultdesignevolution.com  
are the copyrighted property of Adult Design Evolution" 
 
This is our portfolio: http://www.adultdesignevolution.com/tgp-mgp.php 
This is the design created by us:  
http://www.adultdesignevolution.com/Tgp&Mgp/FreeXXXGalleries/index.htm  
<http://www.adultdesignevolution.com/Tgp&Mgp/FreeXXXGalleries/index.htm>

 
Thank you
